objects.text:
• Premium Cotton Material
• Motivational Design
• Stylish Navy Blue Color
• Perfect Gift for Self-Improvement

product_details.name: Inspirational 'Believe in Yourself' Premium Cotton T-Shirt
product_details.description:
• Stylish navy blue color perfect for casual and motivational wear
• Modern typography design with layered 'BELIEVE' text effect
• High-quality cotton material for maximum comfort
• Versatile round neck design suitable for all occasions
• Empowering message that boosts confidence and self-belief
• Durable print technology ensures long-lasting design
• Easy to care for and machine washable
• Available in multiple sizes for perfect fit
• Ideal for both casual wear and workout sessions
• Perfect gift for motivation seekers and self-improvement enthusiasts

banner_details:
This vibrant promotional banner features a geometric, layered background composed of angular shapes in deep navy, maroon, plum, and muted teal. The color palette strikes a balance between modern and energetic, complemented by bright accent elements in golden yellow. The design is centered around a bold promotional message using text layers "heading_1" and "heading_2", rendered in a strong, sans-serif font. The motivational phrase on the shirt is mirrored in the "subheading" text for reinforcement. Text layer "description" provides bulleted product highlights, while "tagline" emphasizes enthusiasm in a handwritten script. Pricing is displayed via the "price" text and a bright "SHOP NOW" call-to-action button ("cta_background" and "cta"). A large product image ("product_image") of a navy blue t-shirt anchors the visual interest on the right.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #1A2A4A
- Deep Maroon: #3F2A28
- Plum: #3B1D39
- Teal Green: #345C64
- Bright Yellow (Accent): #FFD700
- Light Gray: #E0E0E0
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a navy blue t-shirt with motivational typography design. The primary color is a deep navy (#0F1A2B), lending a bold and sophisticated base. The text "BELIEVE" is repeated in a muted bluish-grey (#4A5A6A), blending subtly with the tee for a layered look. The script “In yourself” is rendered in white (#F4F4F4), making it stand out prominently against darker hues and drawing immediate attention. These colors harmonize through contrast and opacity, giving the design depth and inspiration. A banner for this product could incorporate these main colors for a sleek, modern, and encouraging presentation.
